properties.Name: LifeInsurancePolicyProvision
properties.Description: The one or more Policy Provision(s) written into the associated Insurance Policy.

Columns.Name: InsurancePolicyId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Insurance Policy.

Columns.Name: InsuranceProvisionId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Insurance Provision.

Columns.Name: PhysicalExamProvisionIndicator
Columns.Description: A provision requiring a physical exam to be successfully passed in order for the insurance to be in full effect.

Columns.Name: ChangeOfOccupationProvisionIndicator
Columns.Description: A provision dealing with change of occupation under the associated Policy.

Columns.Name: IntoxicantsProvisionIndicator
Columns.Description: A provision dealing with intoxicants under the associated Policy.

Columns.Name: SuicideProvisionIndicator
Columns.Description:
A provision dealing with suicide under the associated Policy.

Most life insurance policies provide that if the insured commits suicide within a specified period, the company's liability will be limited to a return of the premiums paid.

Columns.Name: NarcoticsProvisionIndicator
Columns.Description: A provision dealing with narcotics under the associated Policy.

Columns.Name: AutomaticPremiumProvisionIndicator
Columns.Description:
A provision dealing with automatic premiums under the associated Policy.

This provision authorizes the insurer to automatically pay any premium in default at the end of the grace period and charge the amount paid against the life insurance policy as a policy loan.

Columns.Name: AccidentalMeansProvisionIndicator
Columns.Description: A requirement of an accident-based insurance policy stating that the cause of the mishap must be accidental for any claim to be payable.

Properties.Description: The one or more Policy Provision(s) written into the associated Insurance Policy.
